articles.description: Lionel Messi and Argentina are set to face Colombia in the Copa America 2024 Final at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami The match will mark the end of international careers for Angel di Maria and Nicolas Otamendi
articles.content: Lionel Messi and Argentina are aiming to secure their 4th straight title and the second consecutive Copa America crown when they head out into the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami on Sunday, July 14. Messi… [+2546 chars]

articles.title: Half of cancer deaths could have been prevented through lifestyle changes, says American Cancer Society report - Fox News
articles.description: As many as 40% of cancer cases — and up to half of cancer-related deaths — could have been prevented, according to a new study from the American Cancer Society. Doctors shared thoughts.
